name: Heat Shock
desc:
A 10 foot radius area, increased by 5 feet per AP spent past the first, centered on target point explodes into flames. Creatures inside must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 fire damage, halved on a successful saving throw. If cast for at least 2 AP, the damage is increased to 3d6.
At the start of your next turn, an area with a radius 5 feet smaller than the initial explosion that is centered any point within the previous area explodes into flames. Creatures inside must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 fire damage.
empower: Choose one: Damage increased by 1d6 on both explosions, damage increased by 3d6 on the second explosion, range increased to 90 feet, or radius increased by 5 feet.
author: CrusaderDroid
